item.title: Hegseth, in talks with Chinese counterpart, says US will 'stoutly defend' interests in Indo-Pacific
item.description: U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth told his Chinese counterpart the U.S. will “stoutly defend" its Indo-Pacific interests during talks in Malaysia.

item.title: Trump urges GOP to ‘end the shutdown’ by going nuclear on Senate filibuster
item.description: President Donald Trump on Thursday called for Republicans to eliminate the filibuster in order to end the monthlong government shutdown.
